title: Controlled-entry access, Easy access to I-5, Fitness Center
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 651 Sq.
Lakewood Meadows is pleased to offer affordable senior living (income restrictions apply).
Located in Lakewood, adjacent to St. Clare Hospital and only half a mile west of I-5, Lakewood Meadows senior apartments offers a blend of urban conveniences and suburban living.
Surrounded by grocery shopping, dining, parks and recreation you are sure to find the value of this ideal location.
Lakewood Meadows offers an active senior lifestyle including a fitness center and an array of social activities.
Step inside our 1 or 2 bedroom apartments and enjoy conveniences such as ample storage, space to entertain or relax, and a fully equipped kitchen.
Choose Lakewood Meadows and choose to live well.
- Carpeting in living rooms and bedrooms
- Minutes to shopping, dining and healthcare
- Pet friendly - Puppies and kittens welcome (breed restrictions apply)
Pet friendly - Puppies and kittens welcome (breed restrictions apply).
Visit our website for additional details.
Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.
Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.
